Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Im6: (scorpions, arachnids, Chelicerata, natural AMPs; arthropods, invertebrates, animals, XXA; UCLL1c)

Literature.Author: Miyashita M, Kitanaka A, Yakio M, Yamazaki Y, Nakagawa Y, Miyagawa H. 2017
Literature.Title: Complete de novo sequencing of antimicrobial peptides in the venom of the scorpion Isometrus maculatus

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals 88.2% similar to the sequence of AP1512;  Mol Wt: 1709.105; Mol formula: C86H133N17O19; GRAVY: 1.68; WWWRH: 3.73.Activity: Active against E. coli (MIC 0.4-0.8 uM), S. aureus (MIC 13-25 uM), B. subtilis (MIC 0.8-1.6 uM).Structure: helical in 50% TFE.
